publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-586 Tavish Scott: Most Enterprising Student Competition—That the Parliament congratulates Emily Garrick, a student from Shetland, for her deserved success in winning a commendation in the Scotland and Northern Ireland Most Enterprising Student final for her work on a Shell Step placement with Shetland Seafood Auctions Ltd where she undertook a marketing and web development project, and wishes her and Shona McElroy and Iain Whiteside, the two other Scottish students who are joining Emily in the UK’s Most Enterprising Student 2007 final in London on 10 October 2007, every success in the final.

S3M-586 Tavish Scott: Most Enterprising Student Competition—That the Parliament congratulates Emily Garrick, a student from Shetland, for her deserved success in winning a commendation in the Scotland and Northern Ireland Most Enterprising Student final for her work on a Shell Step placement with Shetland Seafood Auctions Ltd where she undertook a marketing and web development project, and wishes her and Shona McElroy and Iain Whiteside, the two other Scottish students who are joining Emily in the UK’s Most Enterprising Student 2007 final in London on 10 October 2007, every success in the final.
